text: Chris Harris (14 December 1942 - 30 April 2014) was an English actor, director and writer. He appeared in several UK television series including Into the Labyrinth and Hey Look... That's Me. He also had a career in pantomime. He was born in Bridgwater, Somerset. Harris died from cancer on 30 April 2014 in Portishead, Somerset. He was 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Somerset Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English movie directors Category:English screenwriters Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Writers from Somerset
title: Chris Harris (actor)
